name: Thursby Software
overview:
“Transparent enterprise Apple integration, management and security”

Thursby Software is the leader in commercial Apple enterprise integration with over 70,000 clients, including organizations with thousands of devices under management, and well over a million software licenses sold since our founding a quarter century ago.

We have innovation in our corporate DNA, defining the enterprise Apple-to-Microsoft integration market with a series of industry firsts, years before Apple and any other vendor. Both privately held and profitable throughout our history, we offer all the advantages of a focused, well-managed and well-funded startup with a client list from the Pentagon, to John Hopkins, to the Discovery Channel and BMW.

1996 - 1st. Mac SMB / CIFS network home folders & shares (we later co-wrote Mac standards with Microsoft) 2002 - 1st. Mac DFS (Distributed File System) 2003 - 1st. Mac AD (Active Directory), SSO Single Sign On and policy management 2006 - 1st. Mac secure US Government PKI Public Key Infrastructure (rolled out as first Apple US Army Golden Master) 2011 - 1st. Mac remote access smart card integration 2011 - 1st. iPad and iPhone FIPS 140-2 secure browser 2012 - 1st. iPad and iPhone consumer smart card reader

Clients come from all seven continents and range from creative artists, studios and publishing, to government, finance, healthcare, energy, research and education, to the Global 2000 and OEMs. A particular appeal of our software to enterprises is its leverage of standards, not seeking to lock-in to proprietary new server or cloud-based software.
